title: "Surveillance: Evercore’s Emanuel Sees AI Driving US Exceptionalism"
excerpt: "Amid Wall Street’s current infatuation with generative AI, Emanuel offered three key takeaways from the 1990s tech boom. Markets always pull back at some point. The economy does, too, and he still sees a mild downturn in 2024, because “business cycles are not canceled from things like this.”"
